rows.label: qev095203_MSG0001
rows.name:
This is the human city, then? Hmm...
It is a somewhat curious construction.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095203_MSG0002
rows.name:
It does, however, appear to be well-defended.
This should be able to weather even a focused strike
from the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095203_MSG0003
rows.name:
We shall supply you with all the technology we can.
In return, we ask that you put it to use protecting us.[ST:wait ]
